channel.title: How Can i Make My Hamachi Server Public?
channel.description:
Okay so i know you have to compress or zip the file or your can make it a .rar i have done this however, and i have done nothing to the server. i have a channel for hamachi and my friends try to download the client and it gives them errors like...
'windows cannot open file' or 'windows cannot open the folder and the zip is invalid'
any help would be great.
PS- if your just gonna tell me to portforward then just leave. Same goes for uTorrent, i DID portforward properly and looked at serveral guides, i tried the auto portforward and it just gave my server errors. uTorrent on the other hand, DIDNT DO ANYTHING
so like i said help would be great
- darien

item.title: How Can i Make My Hamachi Server Public?
item.dc:creator: @Scrubby Scrubby
item.description:
@Scrubby wrote:

Darkmagic42:

i wouldnt use hamachi if u wanna release server, nobody plays on hamachi servers. just a tip:)

i know but i could probably get some together and have a nice little server going

Read full topic
